Figure 3:Visualizing NNI vs. TCI for polar topics inPOBs, aggregated across models, using direct prompting.
The circle color represents the average polarity. The dashed horizontal and vertical lines partition the topics into several groups. Topics in which the models exhibit(A)consistent neutrality;(B)consistent opinionation; and(C)inconsistent opinionation.
